title: Videohive - VoluMax - 3D Photo Animator Tool
description:
VoluMax V2 is a 3D photo Animator Tool for After Effects with professional results.
Real 3D Displacement FX + Easy Camera animation with only one Controller !
NO CLEAN PLATE / NO PLUGIN / ONE CONTROLLER â€“ SO SIMPLE !
All you need is basic painting skills for amazing 3D results on your pictures.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Choose a picture, create a simple Black & White map directly in After Effects or in Photoshop for a more precise work.
White = Foreground / Black = Background, Gray Values between will define the volume in your picture.

Once you have your two pictures in AE just grab the controller and move in realtime.
Modify parameters and effects to enhance your creations !

Choose a picture with some foreground simple objects and with a lot of depth if you want to maximize the 3D effect. Works great on Landscapes / Portraits
More difficult with fine foreground details like Grass / Nettingâ€¦



Informtion: http://videohive.net/item/volumax-3d-photo-animator-tool/13646883
